mention.text: A JOINT VENTURE OF FDCH , INC.
Sun Metal Works Sdn Bhd when interviewed said that the factory had been deprived of water supply for the past two days
a subsidiary of Wembley Industries Holdings Bhd
The company involved in metal works and production of boilers
Selangor Menteri Besar Datuk Abu Hassan Omar
the public on theft of water
complaints lodged by the public earlier on theft of water
the public earlier on theft of water
